head.title: Arts, Briefly; Mixtape D.J.'s Released on Bond

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Music, Theater and Dance

hedline.hl1: Arts, Briefly; Mixtape D.J.'s Released on Bond

body.head.byline: By BRENDA GOODMAN; Compiled by Lawrence Van Gelder

abstract.p: DJ Drama (Tyree Simmons) and Donald Cannon, who were arrested and charged with racketeering after agents raided their Atlanta recording studio and confiscated 81,000 mixtapes, are released on signature bonds (S)

block.p: Two Atlanta D.J.'s arrested Tuesday night and charged with racketeering after agents raided their recording studio and confiscated 81,000 mixtapes were released on Wednesday on signature bonds, said Uwonda Carter, the lawyer representing Tyree Simmons, who works under the name DJ Drama. Mr. Simmons and Donald Cannon, a protégé and fellow member of the Aphilliates Music Group, have each been charged with one felony count of violating Georgia's Racketeering Influenced Corrupt Organization Law for selling copyrighted music under their Gangsta Grillz label. No pleas were entered, and no further court dates were set, said a clerk for the Fulton County Superior Court.

Two Atlanta D.J.'s arrested Tuesday night and charged with racketeering after agents raided their recording studio and confiscated 81,000 mixtapes were released on Wednesday on signature bonds, said Uwonda Carter, the lawyer representing Tyree Simmons, who works under the name DJ Drama. Mr. Simmons and Donald Cannon, a protégé and fellow member of the Aphilliates Music Group, have each been charged with one felony count of violating Georgia's Racketeering Influenced Corrupt Organization Law for selling copyrighted music under their Gangsta Grillz label. No pleas were entered, and no further court dates were set, said a clerk for the Fulton County Superior Court.
